ygData.subject: New Scenario Editor
ygData.msgSnippet: 1st, what exactly do you guys want your project leader to do in regards to helping you all work on the new scenario editor? 2nd, some people lie on the net.

Subject: New Scenario Editor
Message-ID: <9gqnid+hjkp@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 776
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

1st, what exactly do you guys want your project leader to do in 
regards to helping you all work on the new scenario editor?

2nd, some people lie on the 'net.  May I suggest each one of you all 
potentially working on the new scenario editor, as proof of your 
knowledge, create a simple program to extract from the grid file, a 
list of objects in a grid and save the information to a text file and 
create a program to take said text file and convert it to a grid file? 
 I know that sounds simple enough, but is a nice way of proving your 
knowledge.  BTW, if anyone wants to speculate about why I want the 
aforementioned programs, one reason:  those two programs plus a text 
editor equals one primitve scenario editor to work with while awaiting 
a completely new one.
